title: Teentaal Theka
bols:
Dha Dhin Dhin Dha
Dha Dhin Dhin Dha
Dha Tin Tin Ta
Ta Dhin Dhin Dha
description: The basic theka for Teentaal, the most common 16-beat cycle.
author: Traditional

title: Jhaptaal Theka
bols:
Dhin Na
Dhin Dhin Na
Tin Na
Dhin Dhin Na
description: The basic theka for Jhaptaal, a 10-beat cycle (2+3+2+3).
author: Traditional

title: Rupak Theka
bols:
Tin Tin Na
Dhin Na
Dhin Na
description: 7-beat cycle with khaali on sam. Divided 3+2+2.
author: Traditional

title: Ektaal Theka
bols:
Dhin Dhin
Dha Ge
Ti Ra
Ke Ta
Tun Na
Ka Ta
description: 12-beat cycle commonly used in dhrupad and khayal.
author: Traditional

title: Dadra Theka
bols:
Dha Dhin Na
Dha Tin Na
author: Traditional

title: Keherwa Theka
bols:
Dha Ge Na Ti
Na Ke Dhin Na
description: 8-beat cycle popular in folk and light classical.
author: Traditional

title: Teentaal Kayda 1
bols:
Dha Ti Dha Ge
Na Dha Ti Dha
Dha Ti Dha Ge
Dhin Na Ge Na
Ta Ti Ta Ke
Na Ta Ti Ta
Dha Ti Dha Ge
Dhin Na Ge Na
author: Traditional

title: Simple Tukda
bols:
Dha Dha Ti Ti
Dha Dha Ge Na
Dha Ti Dha Ge
Dhin Na Ge Na
description: A simple tukda (fixed composition) ending with tihai.
author: Traditional
